general.rule: every 'delete' button must have a confirmation button

models.rule: Models only include functions for database queries

helpers.rule: Helpers have various functions and should be organized on categories per folder

lang.rule: we have the following files for every language: [language name], error, misc
language variables names should contain the prefix 'lang_' instead of '[section_name]_' from lang file example: lang file: 'login_submit_button' => controller variable => 'lang_submit_button'
page title variable for every section shoud be named: [section]_page_title example: 'login_page_title', 'general_settings_page_title', etc.
